title: The Living Manifestation of a Basic Attack

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Visit a player at night. With the Necronomicon, you may use this ability one extra time per night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Every player that you visit and every player that visits you will be dealt a Basic attack.

desc:
Post 2484
*Spawned as a result of a maniacal witch tampering with conceptual materialization. The only thing it knows is pain.*
